issue.title: facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com) ### Comment > Every time my iPhone updates, I start getting tons of ads online. When everything is working correctly, I NEVER get ads on FB. As soon as the phone updates they start all over. I reached out last time and someone gave me instructions that worked and fixed it but I don’t remember how. I’m sorry! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ls9nt7xg4sgwsow8s40884sg488wg4kmr31ajsd2cg.png?nc=1)
